title: 3 of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024).
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety 

Act 2024 (Section 104) (Designation of public service body) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (section 104) (designation public service body) order 2025

title: 3 of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024).
heading: 2. An Ghníomhaireacht um Fhoréigean Baile, Gnéasach
text_raw:
2. An Ghníomhaireacht um Fhoréigean Baile, Gnéasach 

agus 
Inscnebhunaithe is designated as a public service body for the purposes of Part 
3 of the Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 May, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [183] 3
